Mind Burn.NAME: Mind Burn
Mind Burn.DESCRIPTION: Play and exhaust your draw pile. Lose 1 HP for each card played. Exhaust.
Mind Burn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Play and exhaust your draw pile. Lose 1 HP for each card played. Exhaust.

Demon Armor.NAME: Demon Armor
Demon Armor.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and gain 1 Dexterity.
